The easiest way to activate your Booking.com listings on Beyond and make up to 40% more revenue. 

Getting started is easy:
   1. Download the extension
   2. Go to https://v2.beyondpricing.com/accounts/connect/channel/booking_connect
   3. Enter your credential & follow the instructions

You’ll be experiencing the impact of the world’s best dynamic pricing platform on your listings in minutes.
